metadata.title: CVE-2020-27793 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An off-by-one overflow flaw was found in radare2 due to mismatched arraylength in core_java.c. This could allow an attacker to cause a crash, andperform a denail of service attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27793` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-5.0.0 - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libradare2-common - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
radare2 - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
